sourcesContent:
import "../styles/toolbar.scss" import { useActions } from './../hooks/useActions' import { useTypedSelector } from './../hooks/useTypedSelector' import Rect from './../tools/rect' import Brush from "../tools/brush" import Circle from './../tools/circle' import Eraser from './../tools/eraser' import Line from './../tools/line' export const ToolBar = () => { const {setTool, fillColor, strokeColor} = useActions() const canvas = useTypedSelector(state => state.canvas.canvas) const tool = useTypedSelector(state => state.tool.tool) let usedEraser = false const changeColor = (c: string) => { tool?.setFillColor(c) fillColor(c) tool?.setStrokeColor(c) strokeColor(c) } const a = () => { if (usedEraser) { usedEraser = false tool?.setStrokeColor(c) } } return
}
